lines: ﻿From a distance he heard the buzz of people talking. Under the cover of darkness he softly tip-toed towards them. A group of villagers was gathered round kerosene-lamps. In front of them hung a red curtain.
"When will the play start?" someone asked.
What was hidden behind the red curtain? Mango could not contain his curiosity and stealthily had a peep. People were busy doing something or the other that Mango could not understand.
The curtain went up. The lamp was lit. Mango liked the sweet smell of the incense. A bell rang, and the noisy crowd outside became quiet.
One of the actors said, "The first scene is set in a jungle. We need a big tree for that. How else will the prince stand behind it and peep at the princess?"
